short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make each film synopsis available on the homepage without having to open the link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Mubi homepage provides little information to help you choose a film - just the title, director and a picture. This plugin provides a button that, when hovered over, grabs the film's synopsis and displays it on the tile.
